title: Ximo Tebar - The Champs - With Joey DeFrancesco
description:
Ximo Tebar - The Champs - With Joey DeFrancesco (Jazz Organ)

Ximo Tebar with Joey DeFrancesco & Idris Muhammad
The Champs (The Jazz Guitar Trio, Vol. 4)

Killer displays of musicality from all concerned. Tebar's bebop-borne chops keep pace with virtuoso DeFrancesco's thrust on the Hammond B-3, but it's far from a screaming, gritty organ set. A more smooth vibe steams off this recording. Highlights are the great swinging Ginger Bread Boy, the Wes Montgomery-influenced playing on Sugar and the uptempo classic The Champ. Excellent timekeeping all the way from Muhammad.


Tracklisting:
01. Ginger Bread Boy (Heath) - 5:50
02. But Not for Me (Gershwin-Gershwin) - 5:04
03. Nica's Dream (Silver) - 8:57
04. Donna Lee (Parker) - 5:16
05. You Don't Know What Love Is (De Paul-Raye) - 7:30
06. St. Thomas (Rollins) - 4:49
07. Sugar (Turrentine) - 6:57
08. The Champ (Gillespie) - 6:31

Total Time: 50:54
